##### <span style="opacity:0.5;" id="software">Software Libraries</span>
<p style="margin-top:30px;"></p> 

[Bootstrap](https://www.getbootstrap.com) - the most popular HTML, CSS, and JS library in the world 
 
[Laravel](https://www.laravel.com) - the PHP framework for artisans 
 
[Shards](https://www.designrevision.com) - a free and modern UI toolkit based on Bootstrap 4

[Vue.js](https://www.vuejs.org) - the progressive JavaScript framework
